info.title: Hotel
info.description:
The Hotel Search REST/JSON API is a hotel search API that enables you to find the best hotel offers that match your search from a wide choice of providers. The results contain the hotel details and will allow the user to select their preferred option based on price, location and amenities among other factors. A wide range of search criteria can be applied to narrow the search results.

## Authorization

Before using the API you will need to get an access token. Please read our **[Authorization Guide](https://developers.amadeus.com/self-service/apis-docs/guides/authorization)** for more information on how to get your token.

get.description:
Return all available details of a specific hotel offer.
   Returned details mainly includes:
  - prices with tax
  - accepted methods of payments
  - cancellation policies
  - guaranteed pricing
  - descriptions about the meal, room, and special rate.

HotelOffers.title: Hotel Offers
HotelOffers.description: details of the requested hotel and the available offers

self.description: a self link to the object

brandCode.description:
Brand (RT...) (Amadeus 2 chars Code). Small Properties distributed by Merchants may not have a Brand.
Example: AD (Value Hotels) is the Provider/Merchant, and RT (Accor) is the Brand of the Property

dupeId.description:
Unique Property identifier of the physical hotel.
One physical hotel can be represented by different Providers, each one having its own `hotelID`.
This attribute allows a client application to group together hotels that are actually the same.

cityCode.description: Warning: The IATA city code associated to the hotel (not necessary the real Hotel City)

latitude.description: Hotel Latitude in decimal degrees (5 decimals)

longitude.description: Hotel Longitude in decimal degrees (5 decimals)

HotelDistance.description: distance from the point of search to the hotel

lines.description: When the address is unformatted these lines will contain free form address details.

countryCode.description: ISO 3166-1 defines codes for the names of countries, dependent territories, and special areas of geographical interest

stateCode.description: ISO 3166-2 defines codes for identifying the principal subdivisions (e.g. provinces or states) of all countries coded in ISO 3166-1

id.description: Unique identifier of this offer. Might be valid for a temporary period only.

checkInDate.description:
check-in date of the stay (hotel local date). Format YYYY-MM-DD

The lowest accepted value is today date (no dates in the past).

checkOutDate.description:
check-out date of the stay (hotel local date). Format YYYY-MM-DD

The lowest accepted value is `checkInDate`+1.

rateCode.description:
Special Rate - Provider Response Code (3 chars)
Examples:
* RAC - Rack
* BAR - Best Available Rate
* PRO - Promotional
* COR - Corporate
* GOV - Government (qualified)
* AAA - AAA (qualified)
* BNB - Bed and Breakfast
* PKG - Package
* TVL - Travel Industry
* SPC - Special Promo Rate
* WKD - Weekend
* CON - Convention
* SNR - Senior (Europe) (qualified)
* ARP - AARP - American Association of Retired People (50+) (qualified)
* SRS - Senior (qualified)
* ROR - Room Only Rate (no breakfast)
* FAM - Family
* DAY - Day rate

category.description:
Special Rate Category
Examples:
 ASSOCIATION
 FAMILY_PLAN

self.description: A self link to the object. Use this to refresh the Offer price

RateFamily.description: The estimated rate code family of the offer. Grouping various rate plan codes that belongs to the same family and indicates the type of the rate

type.description: The type of the rate (public=P, negotiated=N, conditional=C)

percentage.description: Percentage of the commission paid to the travel seller. Value is between 0 and 100

amount.description: Amount of the commission paid to the travel seller. The amount is always linked to the currency code of the offer

type.description:
Room type code, 3 character identifier of the room.
The first character identifies the room type category. 
The second numeric character identifies the number of beds. 
The third character identifies the bed type. 
There is a special case where ROH is returned, this value stands for Run Of House.

adults.description: number of adult guests (1-9) per room

childAges.description: Comma separated list of ages of each child at the time of check-out from the hotel. If several children have the same age, the ages will be repeated.

paymentType.description: payment type. Guarantee means Pay at Check Out. Check the `methods` in `guarantee` or `deposit` or `prepay`.

EstimatedRoomType.description: estimated room category, bed type and number of beds in the room. This information has been parsed from the room description, and is thus only provided for informational purposes

beds.description: Number of beds in the room (1-9)

PriceVariations.description: Daily price variations and the average daily price (when available) is shown here

changes.description: A collection of price periods if the daily price changes during the stay

GuaranteePolicy.description: the guarantee policy information applicable to the offer. It includes accepted payments

DepositPolicy.description: the deposit/prepay policy information applicable to the offer. It includes accepted payments, deadline and the amount due

deadline.description:
The date and time of the deadline in ISO 8601[https://www.w3.org/TR/NOTE-datetime]. 
 Example: 2010-08-14T13:00:00
 Please note that this value is expressed in the hotels local time zone

The date and time of the deadline in ISO 8601[https://www.w3.org/TR/NOTE-datetime]. 
 Example: 2010-08-14T13:00:00
 Please note that this value is expressed in the hotels local time zone

type.description:
["Flat","FlatPerNight", "Nights", "StayPercent", "FirstNight", "LastNight", "FirstAndLastNight", "FullStay"]
Several penalty types can apply for the same product.

numberOfNights.description: Number of nights due as fee in case of cancellation.

percentage.description: Percentage of the total stay amount to be paid in case of cancellation. Value is between 0 and 100.

deadline.description:
Represents the deadline's date. Time is in ISO 8601 [https://www.w3.org/TR/NOTE-datetime].
Example: 2010-08-14T13:00:00
Please note that this value is expressed in the hotels local time zone

checkIn.description: Check-in From time limit in ISO-8601 format [http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#time]

checkOut.description: Check-out Until time limit in ISO-8601 format [http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#time]

code.description:
The tax code which identifies the tax.
  Examples:
  1=BED_TAX
  2=CITY_TAX

percentage.description: percentage of the tax. Use together with pricingFrequency and pricingMode

included.description: Is the tax included in the base amount

pricingFrequency.description:
Specifies if the tax applies per stay or per night
 - PER_STAY
 - PER_NIGHT

pricingMode.description:
Specifies if the tax applies per occupant or per room
 - PER_OCCUPANT
 - PER_PRODUCT

BaseTotalAmount.description: estimated nightly average for the stay

PriceVariation.title: Price variation
PriceVariation.description: Some prices may vary during a stay, thus here you can see the daily price per period of the stay

startDate.description:
Begin date of the period
Format: YYYY-MM-DD

endDate.description:
End date of the period
Format: YYYY-MM-DD

PaymentPolicy.description: Accepted Payment Methods and Card Types. Several Payment Methods and Card Types may be available

creditCards.description: Accepted Payment Card Types for the `method` CREDIT_CARD

items.description:
card type (CA, VI, AX, DC...)
Examples:
  * CA - MasterCard (warning: use it instead of MC/IK/EC/MD/XS)
  * VI - Visa
  * AX - American Express
  * DC - Diners Club
  * AU - Carte Aurore
  * CG - Cofinoga
  * DS - Discover
  * GK - Lufthansa GK Card
  * JC - Japanese Credit Bureau
  * TC - Torch Club
  * TP - Universal Air Travel Card
  * BC - Bank Card
  * DL - Delta
  * MA - Maestro
  * UP - China UnionPay

The Payment Methods :
 * CREDIT_CARD (CC) - Payment Cards in `creditCards` are accepted
 * TRAVEL_AGENT_ID - Agency IATA/ARC Number is accepted to Guarantee the booking
 * CORPORATE_ID (COR-ID) - Corporate Account is accepted to Guarantee the booking
 * HOTEL_GUEST_ID - Hotel Chain Rewards Card Number is accepted to Guarantee the booking
 * CHECK - Checks are accepted
 * MISC_CHARGE_ORDER - Miscellaneous Charge Order is accepted
 * ADVANCE_DEPOSIT - Cash is accepted for Deposit/PrePay
 * COMPANY_ADDRESS - Company Billing Address is accepted to Guarantee the booking

lang.description: Language code of the text ISO language code (https://www.iso.org/iso-639-language-codes.html)
the default language of all texts returned

Links.description: links to continue in the shopping process

next.description: Use this link to get the next hotels in the search result

CurrencyConversionRate.description: conversion from provider's currency to requested currency

rate.description: The conversion factor to apply against the source currency to obtain the requested currency

targetDecimalPlaces.description: Indicates the number of decimal places for the target currency

code.description: [Integer] A machine-readable error code from the Amadeus Canned Messages table, that will enable the API Consumers code to handle this type of error

title.description: [String] An error title from the Canned Messages table with a 1:1 correspondence to the error code. This may be localized

detail.description: [String] An easy-to-read explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem. It should give the API consumer an idea of what went wrong and how to recover from it. Like the title, this field’s value can be localized.

status.description: [Integer] The [HTTP status code](https://www.iana.org/assignments/http-status-codes/http-status-codes.xhtml) of this response. This is present only in terminal errors which cause an unsuccessful response. In the case of multiple errors, they must all have the same status.

cityCode.name: cityCode
cityCode.description:
Destination City Code (or Airport Code). In case of city code, the search will be done around the city center. Available codes can be found in [IATA table codes](http://www.iata.org/publications/Pages/code-search.aspx) (3 chars IATA Code)     

Example: PAR

Should be used together with `radius`+`radiusUnit` (required)

__Mandatory parameter for a city search__

latitude.name: latitude
latitude.description:
search around a geographical point. The latitude is specified in decimal degrees    

Example: 52.5238    

Should be used together with `longitude`+`radius`+`radiusUnit`  (required)

__Mandatory parameter for a search by geocodes__

longitude.name: longitude
longitude.description:
search around a geographical point. The longitude is specified in decimal degrees    

Example: 13.3835

Should be used together with `latitude`+`radius`+`radiusUnit`  (required)

__Mandatory parameter for a search by geocodes__

hotelIds.name: hotelIds
hotelIds.description:
Amadeus Property Codes (8 chars) (comma separated list)

Example: BGLONBGB,BGMILBGB    

__Mandatory parameter for a search by predefined list of hotels__

hotelId.name: hotelId
hotelId.description:
Amadeus Property Code (8 chars)

Example: BGMILBGB

radius.name: radius
radius.description: maximum distance (in `radiusUnit`) from Destination (city center or geocodes)

hotelName.name: hotelName
hotelName.description:
Search by Hotel Name. Accepts maximum 4 keywords.

Example: Hotel California
Example: Hotel Califo

chains.name: chains
chains.description:
Chain (EM...) or Brand (SB...) or Merchant (AD...) (comma separated list of Amadeus 2 chars Codes)

Example Chains:
* EM = Marriott
* EH = Hilton
* HY = Hyatt
* 6C = IHG
* WR = Wyndham
* RT = Accor
* BW = Best Western
* EC = Choice
* CW = Radisson

Example Merchants:
* AD = Value Hotels    
* HV = HRS

ratings.name: ratings
ratings.description:
hotel stars. Up to four values can be requested at the same time in a comma separated list
* 5 stars
* 4 stars
* 3 stars
* 2 stars
* 1 star

view.name: view
view.description:
hotel descriptive content to include in the response

NONE: geocoordinates, hotel distance

LIGHT: NONE view + city name, phone number, fax, address, postal code, country code, state code, ratings, 1 image

FULL: LIGHT view + hotel description, amenities and facilities

view_single.name: view
view_single.description:
hotel descriptive content to include in the response

NONE: geocoordinates, hotel distance

LIGHT: NONE view + city name, phone number, fax, address, postal code, country code, state code, ratings, 1 image

FULL: LIGHT view + hotel description, amenities and facilities

FULL_ALL_IMAGES: FULL view + all images

pageLimit.name: page[limit]
pageLimit.description: maximum number of hotels to return in each response

pageOffset.name: page[offset]
pageOffset.description: used to specify the next scrolling window if all offers could not be returned in the current response. Use the next link in the response to have it automatically added.

lang.name: lang
lang.description:
requested language of descriptive texts. 

Examples: FR , fr , fr-FR

if a language is not avaiable the text will be returned in english.
ISO language code (https://www.iso.org/iso-639-language-codes.html)

includeClosed.name: includeClosed
includeClosed.description: show All properties (include Sold Out) or Available only. For Sold Out properties, please check availability on other dates. To be used with `sort` DISTANCE or NONE

checkInDate.name: checkInDate
checkInDate.description:
check-in date of the stay (hotel local date). Format YYYY-MM-DD

The lowest accepted value is the present date (no dates in the past). 
If not present, the default value will be today's date in the GMT timezone.

checkOutDate.name: checkOutDate
checkOutDate.description:
check-out date of the stay (hotel local date). Format YYYY-MM-DD

The lowest accepted value is checkInDate+1. 
If not present, it will default to checkInDate + 1

adults.name: adults
adults.description: number of adult guests (1-9) per room

childAges.name: childAges
childAges.description: comma separated list of ages of each child at the time of check-out from the hotel. If several children have the same age, their ages should be repeated in the list

rateCodes.name: rateCodes
rateCodes.description:
Special Rate (comma separated list of Amadeus 3 chars Codes): Public Rate (PRO...), Qualified Rate (GOV...) or Corporate Rate (IBM...).

When a Corporate Rate is entered, Amadeus performs a check to verify which chains have authorized the caller to view the rate, only authorized chains will be queried for availability.

Warning: The availability response can also contain Public rates.

Example Rates: 
* GOV - Government Rate
* AAA - AAA Rate
* MIL - Military/Veteran Rate
* SNR - Senior Rate
* PRO - Promotional Code
* COR - Corporate Code

priceRange.name: priceRange
priceRange.description:
filter hotel offers by price per night interval (ex: 200-300 or -300 or 100)

It is mandatory to include a currency when this field is set

Note: a margin of +/- 10% is applied on the daily price

currency.name: currency
currency.description:
use this parameter to request a specific currency. ISO currency code (http://www.iso.org/iso/home/standards/currency_codes.htm).

If a hotel does not support the requested currency, the prices for the hotel will be returned in the local currency of the hotel
and instead a currency conversion rate will be added in the dictionary.

Example: EUR

paymentPolicy.name: paymentPolicy
paymentPolicy.description: filter the response based on a specific payment type. NONE means all types (default)

boardType.name: boardType
boardType.description:
filter response based on available meals
* ROOM_ONLY = RO / Room Only
* BREAKFAST = BB / Bed & Breakfast
* HALF_BOARD = DBB / Diner & Bed & Breakfast (only for Aggregators)
* FULL_BOARD = FB / Full Board (only for Aggregators)
* ALL_INCLUSIVE = AI / All Inclusive (only for Aggregators)

bestRateOnly.name: bestRateOnly
bestRateOnly.description: use to return only the cheapest offer per hotel or all available offers

sort.name: sort
sort.description:
sort by:
* distance from city center (or reference point)
* lowest price first (warning: all hotels may not be returned)

offerId.name: offerId
offerId.description: offer id to request. Please note that an offer id has a limited lifetime and will expire

MultiHotelsOffers.description: An array of hotel offers, ie. hotels with their attributes plus available offers for each returned hotel.

data.description: The list of the hotels matching the search criteria, and the available offers for each hotel.

SingleHotelOffers.description: A single hotel with available offers.

Error400Response.description:
code    | title 
------- | -------------------------------------  
23      | PASSENGER TYPE NOT SUPPORTED
61      | INVALID CURRENCY CODE
137     | INVALID ADULTS OCCUPANCY REQUESTED
145     | DURATION PERIOD OR DATES INCORRECT
195     | SERVICE RESTRICTION
249     | INVALID RATE CODE
377     | MAX STAY DURATION IS EXCEEDED
381     | INVALID CHECK-IN DATE
382     | INVALID CHECK-OUT DATE
383     | INVALID CITY CODE
392     | INVALID HOTEL CODE
397     | INVALID NUMBER OF ADULTS
400     | INVALID PROPERTY CODE
402     | INVALID ROOM TYPE
404     | CHECK_OUT DATE MUST BE FURTHER IN THE FUTURE THAN CHECK-IN DATE
424     | NO HOTELS FOUND WHICH MATCH THIS INPUT
431     | CHECK-OUT DATE IS TOO FAR IN THE FUTURE
450     | INVALID PROVIDER RESPONSE
451     | INVALID CREDENTIALS
562     | RESTRICTED ACCESS FOR THE REQUESTED RATES AND CHAINS  
784     | PROVIDER TIME OUT
790     | NO PROPERTIES FOUND WITHIN THIS RADIUS
795     | NO SIMILAR NAME FOUND, PLEASE ENLARGE YOUR SEARCH CRITERIA
842     | RATE SECURITY NOT LOADED

tags.name: shopping
tags.description: Search Available Hotels and Check their Price
